page.title: 20Acknowledgements:Glenalmond
page.content:
The following 4th form History set compiled this report: W.R.Anderson S.R.Murray R.D.E.Armstrong P.K.G.Mynett L.Becattelli D.R.Oswald P.E.Bell A.G.Paterson H.W.Boyle W.G.Sutton D.A.Gordon S.Thompson A.A.R.Halford P.M.R.Turner -Macleod C.J.Macpherson
Masters i/c D.K.Poulter, A.J.Reid
The first Warden of Trinity College was Rev.Charles Wordsworth. His uncle, the poet William Wordsworth, visited the Glen and wrote a poem about the legendary bard Ossian. An extract reads: 'But this is calm; there cannot be A more entire tranquility.'
